name: Falling Skies Platformer
description:
Welcome to Falling Skies,

The Realms are dying and they need a Hero to collect the coins to keep them afloat.

Sound track - 'Sneaky Snitch' provided by Kevin MacLeod

                                                                * Character Controls *

                                             Walk -                                                   W, A, S, D
                                             Look -                                                    Mouse
                                             Jump -                                                   SPACE
                                             Crouch  -                                              Left Ctrl
                                             Glide -                                                   SPACE (In Air)
                                             Interact -                                             E
                                             God Mode (Bonus Flight) -       G (In Air)
                                             Quit -                                                     Esc

'God Mode' is a bonus feature not intended for the level experience and we recommend using after completing the level. Activate with 'G' while falling to enable character flight with super speed. Fun Tip: try completing the level and collecting all the coins using only god mode.

This is a one off concept level,
If you enjoyed this project or would like to see more levels produced from it, please leave a comment below.  Additionally, any constructive feedback is thoroughly welcomed.

A project made to learn how to create a 3D Platformer game in Unreal Engine using C++ code.

Assets were provided from Unreal Engines Hour of code Project.

Background sound track - 'Sneaky Snitch' provided by Kevin MacLeod 
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4384-sneaky-snitch
https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Win sound effect - provided by: LittleRobotSoundFactory

Currently for Windows only.

Minimum System Requirements:

Storage -            360MB (recommended 1GB)

Memory -           4GB (recommended 8 GB)

OS -                        Windows XP and upwards (recommended windows 7 and up)

CPU -                     Intel Core 2 Quad Q9000 (recommended intel i3 or better)

GPU -                     NVIDIA GeForce 510 (recommended NVIDIA 1060 or better)

(The minimum are recommendations and have not been tested. The recommended have only been tested on higher end windows builds)
